control_attributes.control_description: The organization:  The organization:(a) Establishes and administers privileged user accounts in accordance with a role-based access scheme that organizes allowed information system access and privileges into roles;(b) Monitors privileged role assignments; and(c) Takes [Assignment: organization-defined actions] when privileged role assignments are no longer appropriate.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system does not release information outside of the established system boundary unless:

Control Statement: The organization:  The organization:(a) Establishes and administers privileged user accounts in accordance with a role-based access scheme that organizes allowed information system access and privileges into roles;(b) Monitors privileged role assignments; and(c) Takes [Assignment: organization-defined actions] when privileged role assignments are no longer appropriate.
